Articles.Content:
Just like every variant out there of Atlas the Geography game.

Rules:

1. Must be a County, City, State, Country or Continent on Earth and Earth only. 
 

2. Your play must be based off of the final letter of the preceding location. Detroit = T. South Korea = A. Democratic Republic of the Congo = O.

3. Your chosen geographical location MUST be clearly named.

4. Coordinates may be used to identify the locations position on Earth as a proof of its existence if said location is not well known.

5. Your target location may not be vague, ie America or Europe. With America the following play has 0 idea if you mean North, Central, South, or the USA. With Europe while it IS a continent, for purposes of this iteration it is considered vague. One cannot know if you mean the continent or if you mean it as if saying “I’m going to Europe for the summer.” 

6. So long as there exists verifiable historical record of its existence you may play ancient locations. Proper proof will be required. A historical text citing or wikipedia entry will suffice. I suggest but do not require proofs be in spoilers for a more clean look.

7. Duplication of locations are fine if no other option can be found.

8. If 24 hours pass with no play on an entry, you may play again if desired.

I will start us off:

Democratic Republic of the Congo 
 

023808012024

024308012024
